name: LootBoxPrizeStrategyListenerFactory
description: Allows users to plunder an address associated with an ERC721. Counterfactually instantiates a "Loot Box" at an address unique to an ERC721 token. The address for an ERC721 token can be computed and later plundered by transferring token balances to the ERC721 owner.

eventDecorators.name: CreatedListener
eventDecorators.description: Validator's status changed. Event emitted for each executed trade.
